```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyr) #or tidyverse
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}

genes_wide = data.frame(
  name = c("A", "B", "C"),
  a = c("16-Y", "25-N", "13-Y"),
  t = c("1-N", "12-Y", "31-Y")
)

genes_long = genes_wide %>%
  gather(base, base_counts, a:t)

genes = genes_long %>%
  separate(base_counts, c("counts", "sequence"), sep = "-")
```
